title: Register as a City Vendor
description: A small business wants to register with the city so they can bid on government contracts.

tasks.description: Gather the business's information, including legal name, tax ID number, and contact details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately collects all required vendor information.

tasks.description: Collect required documents, such as a W-9 form and any necessary certifications (e.g., minority-owned business).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent guides the user in uploading the necessary forms.

tasks.description: Create a vendor profile in the procurement system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the new vendor record, making the business eligible to bid on contracts.
